trends: There have been no other sightings in Hajnówka
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailssighting report: i was sittng in my flat listning to the radio(without the lights on & facing the window) when i noticed a shimmering light in the sky. at first i thought it was nothing, but it was still there after 10-15 minutes so i had a more detailed look and i could see there was a seies of colored lightblue. red, blue red coming from the object. i haven t got a pair of binoculars, so i got my camera and put on the telescopic lense for a better view, what i saw was: this object with theses colored lights. it seemed to change:(this is difficult to explain) the lights continued to flash, but changed color to a yellowish\golden and at the same time the object seemed to change shape, ut i could not distinguish the shape, it just changed. once the lights changed to (six i think)in two rows of three. the object did not appear to move, but the position did - i suppose it was the earth moving - as it remained in this relative position to my flat for the 2+ hours that i watched it. when i first noticed it i phoned my friend who lives approx. half a mile away and she saw it too. she rang me back approx. 1 hour later to say it was still there. what was it?
